https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/r9DBlxyY8Y6ze1tD6hGUl5MQdkz.jpg A human story unfolds when detectives aggravated by a major bust gone wrong are forced to deal with a tormented man thrown into the cage after urinating on the Mayor's limo. The explosive combination of character and situation balances intense drama with laugh out loud comedy. A Line in the Sand
